changeNote.en-GB: Change Note 2015-08-27: This concept was merged into concept medtop:20000139 as their semantics were not sufficiently different

definition.de: Ein plötzliches, unerwartetes Ereignis, was eine sofortige Reaktion erfordert, um schwere Folgen zu verhindern
definition.dk: En pludselig, uventet begivenhed, der kræver øjeblikkelig handling for at forhindre alvorlige konsekvenser.
definition.en-GB: A sudden, unexpected event that requires immediate action to prevent serious consequences
definition.en-US: A sudden, unexpected event that requires immediate action to prevent serious consequences
definition.pt-BR: Evento súbito, inesperado que requer ação imediata.
definition.pt-PT: Evento súbito, inesperado que requer ação imediata.
definition.zh-Hans: 需要立即采取行动以避免严重后果的突发、意外事件
